p: Several variations of LRRK2 gene were identified as risk factors for PD. For example, rs34778348 (G2385R, c.7153G>A) and rs33949390 (R1628P, c.4883G>C) were seen to associate with PD in Asian population [ 5, 6]. Another novel SNP within LRRK2, rs1491942, was found to be responsible for PD in Caucasian populations [ 7, 8]. However, it was never reported in Chinese Han population before.
